data.message:
Hi Facebook, Thank you for the support and solidarity with innocent french people. As you would have noticed that recently terrorists attacked Indian Airbase in Pathankot, Punjab, India. 7 brave hearts have lost their lives in the battle. They are young officers who laid down their lives to protect innocent Indian citizens and attack on our sovereign and secular values. Some of these officers were the sole breadwinners for the family, another one has a few months old daughter. I was wondering if you could create a filter with Indian flag and share it or guide me who to do it myself that will be great.

I would be honored to show my support to these brave hearts and their grieving families. #istandforhumanityandpeace

replies.message: We appreciate your feedback, Rishi. We've learned a lot from this launch. We're continuing to explore how we can help people use their Facebook profiles to show their support for the things they care about. Please share your suggestion with us here: http://on.fb.me/22H0rzH. -Nancy

Thank you Nancy for your prompt reply. I have posted the suggestion on the provided link but have not heard back from them. 
I would have appreciated had some action been taken upon my words. A country with the second largest user base for Facebook, all we asked for was a filter.

Do you want to buy t-shirts, my design

 https://teespring.com/decorative-lines-is-the-art-an?utm_source=recently_viewed#pid=369&cid=6512&sid=front
What do you think about lnnocent Serbian people?
lOVE FACEBOOK-BUT IF YOU COULD PLACE CHAT WHERE IT WOULD NOT HIDE OR COVER OUR MESSAGES---WOULD*BE SO MUCH HELP-HAVE YOU NOTICED HOW IT DOES THIS//??
